title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Ripple (XRP) Gains 5.8%, Leading Index Higher
author: CoinDesk Indices
summary: Sui (SUI) joined Ripple (XRP) as a top performer, gaining 5.2% over the weekend.
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2800.9, up 1.3% (+34.92) since 4 p.m. ET on Friday.

Nine of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: XRP (+5.8%) and SUI (+5.2%).

Laggards: BCH (-6.2%) and UNI (-4.8%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index gained 1.3% with more assets trading higher than lower, led by significant gains in XRP and SUI.
